item.title: I am about to buy $1000 worth of ethereum just because I feel like speculating. What do you think?
item.description:
I am about to buy $1000 worth of ethereum just because I feel like speculating. What do you think?

"You know, I always wanted a red-headed grandson," my grandmother said to one of the young men in my circle of friends. She said it with a certain sparkle in her green eyes that let us know exactly what she meant, and I turned fifteen shades of pink. She got her wish.

item.title: Isilines Accepts Bitcoin Payments For International Bus Travel
item.description:
Isilines Accepts Bitcoin Payments For International Bus Travel

Richard Dujardin, CEO of Transdev France, sees this service as a sign of the company's "groundbreaking innovation policy" International bus travel is becoming a popular trend these days. Isilines, a French bus travel company and subsidiary of the Transdev group, is currently experimenting with cryptocurrency payments.

item.title: California Lawmaker Shelves Bitcoin Legislation
item.description:
California Lawmaker Shelves Bitcoin Legislation

California won't become the second state after New York to have a "BitLicense" type of law any time soon. The lawmaker who introduced AB 1326, California Assembly member Matt Dababneh, D-Encino, has shelved it, marking the second straight year such legislation has been sidelined.

item.title: Amazon-Owned Twitch Re-adds Bitcoin Payments Using Coinbase
item.description:
Amazon-Owned Twitch Re-adds Bitcoin Payments Using Coinbase

Twitch, an Amazon-owned live streaming video platform which integrated Bitcoin back in August 2014, has began to offer Bitcoin as a payment option again using the Coinbase payment processing gateway since August 21, 2016. Two years ago, Twitch partnered with gaming payments giant Xsolla to provide various payment options to its gamers and users.

item.title: Can Two Ethereum Markets Co-Exist? - CoinDesk
item.description:
Can Two Ethereum Markets Co-Exist? - CoinDesk

item.title: Expert Says BlockStream Mission Not Aligned with Community
item.description:
Expert Says BlockStream Mission Not Aligned with Community

Taylor Gerring, the Director of Technology at Ethereum and former Vice President of Engineering at Hive Bitcoin Wallet, has recently triggered a controversial discussion in various online Bitcoin communities with his statement on social media. On Twitter, Gerring wrote, "Bitcoin needs to fork BlockStream.

item.title: The Bitcoin Game #38: Rodolfo Novak of Coinkite & Opendime
item.description:
The Bitcoin Game #38: Rodolfo Novak of Coinkite & Opendime

Hello, welcome to episode 38 of The Bitcoin Game. I'm Rob Mitchell. It's always great interviewing a knowledgeable person who's not afraid to give an opinion, and Rodolfo Novak is that sort of guest.
